p: The CGCM and AGCM monthly outputs are available for 13 and 11 models (multiple realizations available for some of the CGCMs) in the CMIP5 archive, respectively, however with only 5 models in common (Table S1 in the supporting information). The results using all available models and the subset using the five common models are largely robust (Figure S1). Here we show the results using the five common models using only the first realization for consistency purposes. All model outputs were interpolated to a 2 ∘×2 ∘ spatial resolution.
